translation:
Reserved

I have just received official reports from the President of Santa Catarina that the town of Laguna has been restored and likewise that of Lages, and the rebels expelled from both and defeated, with great loss; a force from São Paulo of 1200 men has arrived in Lages and occupies and garrisons this district. By the end of this month a strong column of ours will depart through the North and Mostardas, and according to the plan that is arranged it is incumbent upon Your Mercy

God Keep Your Mercy Government Palace in Porto Alegre, December 4, 1839 Saturnino de Sousa e Oliveira

Mr. Ma- Mr. Major Manuel José Simas. It is in accordance. Luís José Ribeiro Barreto. It is in accordance. Manuel Vieira Lima The interim Chief Officer. Vicente Ferrer de Almeida.

Annexed to document CV-133
